query:
UPDATE entries
            SET update_number = nextval('entry_update_numbers'),
                recorded_at = now(),
                source_id = $1,
                record_trigger = $2,
                kind = $3,
                original_size = $4,
                encrypted_size = $5,
                modified_at = $6,
                content_hash = $7,
                unix_mode = $8
            WHERE id = $9
